title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 164 - Aids Testing And Confidentiality Of Hiv-related Information: Requirements Regarding Testing, Confidentiality And Precautions Concerning The Human Immunodeficiency Virus (hiv) And Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (aids)
